Palpation to determine foetal lie and presentation
Th e pelvic grips (four in number) are performed to determine the lie and the presenting 
part of the foetus.  
/circle6 Palpate for the foetal lie and assess whether it is longitudinal, transverse or oblique. 
Remember that even if a malpresentation is diagnosed before 36 weeks, no active
